page.title: 08Arable farming at Dearnford
page.content: EA typical arable farm grows potatoes, corn,sugarbeet + peas.The arable land on this farm covers 300 acres, 45a. of potatoes,170a.corn, 50a.sugarbeet,30a. peas and 5a.carrots.It yields 750 tons of potatoes and 450t. of corn.A years calendar:-Jan/Feb maintenance, seed + fertilizer buying.Mar/Apr. sowing and planting.May/June spraying. July harvest early potatoes. Aug.combine winter barley, peas and potatoes.Sept. General harvest sow winter corn. Oct/Nov/Dec harvest late potatoes + sugarbeet. MACHINERY:4 tractors,1potato harvester 1 sugar beet harvester,1 corn drier,1 de-stoner,1power harrow,1 landrover, 2 sprayers,1 corndrill,1plough,numerous trailers. MANPOWER:Mr.Bebbington(owner)and 1 full time employee,casual labour at harvest time.
